feed.title: Track Awesome Computational Neuroscience Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A list of schools and researchers in computational neuroscience

entry.title: Awesome Computational Neuroscience Updates on Jul 15, 2022
entry.content:
EPFL

  • Neuroscience (EDNE)
  • Computer and Communication Sciences (EDIC)
  • Computational and Quantitative Biology (EDCB)

entry.title: Awesome Computational Neuroscience Updates on Nov 24, 2019
entry.content:
U.S. West / University of California, Irvine

  • Admission to UCI Cognitive Sciences Ph.D. program. GRE general test required to: 4859

entry.title: Awesome Computational Neuroscience Updates on Aug 29, 2019
entry.content:
U.S. West / University of California, Los Angeles

  • Admission to UCLA Interdepartmental Ph.D. program in Neuroscience. GRE general test required to: R4837 Field code: 0213

entry.title: Awesome Computational Neuroscience Updates on Jul 27, 2019
entry.content:
INI

  • Ruhr-Universität Bochum, Institut für Neuroinformatik (INI)

SISSA

  • International School for Advanced Studies (SISSA), Trieste

NTNU

  • Kavli Institute for Systems Neuroscience Center for Neural Computation @ Norwegian University of Science and Technology
  • Apply to Ph.D. in Medicine and Health Sciences. Masters degree requirement. Admission is rolling. Applications to the department with the desired academic advisor.

Ontario / University of Waterloo

  • Theoretical Neuroscience
  • Apply: Apply to established graduate department (e.g. Applied Math, Computer science, Psychology, Statistics)
  • For CS a GRE is required if you have not completed a Bachelor's degree in a North American university with English as a primary language.

U.S. West / California Institute of Technology

  • CNS
  • General Graduate application, multidisciplinary program.

U.S. West / Stanford University

  • MBCT
  • Neurosciences Ph.d., GREs no longer used.

U.S. West / University of California, Berkeley

  • Theoretical Neuroscience
  • Neuroscience Ph.D., GRE: Institution: 4833, Department: 0213
  • Vision Science Ph.D., Apply, GRE: Institution: 4833, Department: 0611
  • Electrical Engineering and Computer Sciences, Ph.D., GRE: Institution(4833), Department(Not required)

U.S. West / University of California, Davis

  • Computational Neuroscience
  • Neuroscience, GRE: Institution(4834), Dept(None specified), GRE Subject test encouraged (...)

U.S. West / University of California San Diego

  • Neurograd program, GRE: Institution(4836) Department(0213), Specify interest in Computational Neuroscience specialization

U.S. West / University of California, Santa Barbara

  • DYNS
  • Graduate School application. Regardless of degree, preference will be given to applicants with undergraduate coursework in biology, chemistry, physics, and mathematics

U.S. West / University of Oregon

  • Computational and Systems Neuroscience

U.S. West / University of Southern California

  • USC Neuroscience Graduate Program. GRE Average: 155(Verbal), 167(Quant), Institution(4852), Department(0213)

U.S. West / University of Texas, Austin

  • Apply through: GRE: Institutional(6882), Mathematics (GRE: self report on application), Computer Science (No minimum, but high quant), Physics, ECE, Neuroscience, Psychology...

U.S. West / University of Washington, Seattle

  • Computational Neuroscience Center
  • Apply to Computer Science and Engineering, Applied Mathematics, Neurobiology and Behavior, Psychology, Physics...

U.S. Central / University of Chicago

  • Neuroscience
  • Apply to biosciences. Optional GRE @ Institution(1832).

U.S. Central / University of Illinois

  • Computational Neuroscience
  • No school or department code for GRE, but GRE required for Neuroscience admission.

U.S. Central / University of Iowa

  • Neuroscience Ph.D.
  • Apply to joint graduate program in neuroscience. No GRE requirement?

U.S. Central / University of Minnesota

  • Computational Neuroscience
  • Neuroscience graduate admission

U.S. East / Boston University

  • Computational Neuroscience
  • Apply directly through the Graduate Portal for Neuroscience

U.S. East / Brandeis University

  • Ph.D. GREs not required. Letters of recommendation are important.
  • See also: Sloan-Swartz Center for Theoretical Neuroscience

U.S. East / Brown University

  • Computational Neuroscience
  • For all departments, apply generally to Brown Graduate school. GRE @ Institution(3094). For Brown University School of Public Health @ Institution(7765). Neuroscience @ Departmnent(0213). Applied Math ?.
  • For NIH/Neuroscience also fill out the NIH Partnership Application
  • See Behavioral Neuroscience Requirements

U.S. East / Carnegie Mellon University and University of Pittsburgh

  • Computational Neuroscience
  • Ph.D. in Neural Computation. GRE not required but Institution(0274) and Department(0213).
  • Applications open during submission times

U.S. East / Columbia University

  • Center for Theoretical Neuroscience.

U.S. East / Johns Hopkins University

  • Neuroscience at JHU
  • Solomon H. Snyder Department of Neuroscience.

U.S. East / Johns Hopkins University - Janelia Joint Graduate Program

  • Janelia Labs
  • Joint Ph.D. program

U.S. East / Massachussetts Institute of Technology

  • Brain + Cognitive Sciences, GRE Institution(3514),
  • Center for Brains, Minds and Machines
